resources.string: Here you can upload offers or post job requirements etc. for your business!
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Now just one tap far away from your all daily needs. iSeva app is a local search engine help you to search health services, educational institutes, hotel and restaurants, property, professionals, shopping zone, beauty parlor, boutique, freelancer and many more details of your city business.

 1. iSeva app help you to get best offer from your favorite business on just one tap.
 2. iSeva app help to get jobs for job seekers.
 3. iSeva help you to add your business digitally.

 So download iSeva app and become part of digital india.

Merchant should not post any unwanted material on his profile otherwise we hold the right to terminate Merchant profile from iSeva without any prior notice.

iSeva is not responsible if merchant is found involved in any kind of illegal business.
